creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: seated male figure wearing white short-sleeved T-shirt, black pants, sandals with three straps each and black hair parted at PL side; hands rest at knees with PR thumb overlapping PL thumb; yellow, tan, red, black, white and green pigment washes; sculpture has legs that need to extend over a display base (base not included)
signed: underside of buttocks/ thighs, in black wash: Akio / 2007
title: Seated Boy Wearing Sandals
